ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.common.http

Class HttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.common.http.HttpClient

  • public class HttpClient
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple HTTP client for performing requests with major HTTP verbs. Created by rishi on 15-10-31.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HttpClient(java.lang.String root)
      Creates an instance of HttpClient.
      HttpClient(java.net.URL root)
      Creates an instance of HttpClient/

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HttpResponse makeDeleteRequest(java.lang.String suffix)
      Performs an HTTP DELETE request at the URL formed using the provided suffix appended to the root.
      HttpResponse makeGetRequest(java.lang.String suffix)
      Performs an HTTP GET request at the URL formed using the provided suffix appended to the root.
      HttpResponse makePostRequest(java.lang.String suffix, byte[] postData)
      Performs an HTTP POST request at the URL formed using the provided suffix appended to the root.
      HttpResponse makePutRequest(java.lang.String suffix, byte[] putData)
      Performs an HTTP PUT request at the URL formed using the provided suffix appended to the root.

        Performs an HTTP POST request at the URL formed using the provided suffix appended to the root.
        Parameters:
        suffix - The suffix to be appended to the root URL.
        postData - The byte array to be sent as the contents of the request.

        The received HttpResponse.
